coreAttributes.name: belted microskirt
coreAttributes.description: Consisting of little more than belt holding up a narrow band of tight-fitting fabric, this microskirt is so short that it leaves its wearer's private parts completely exposed.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(step)] into the microskirt and [npc.verb(pull)] it up around [npc.her] waist, before tightening the belt to hold it in place.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.name] to step into the microskirt, before pulling it up around [npc2.her] waist and then tightening the belt to hold it in place.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.name] to step into the microskirt, before yanking it up around [npc2.her] waist and then cruelly tightening the belt to hold it in place.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the belt holding up [npc.her] microskirt, before slipping it off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the belt holding up [npc2.namePos] microskirt, before slipping it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unfasten)] the belt holding up [npc2.namePos] microskirt, before yanking it off.
